# Datu AI Analyst

> Datu AI Analyst is a Python SDK for building AI agents that can interact with data, perform analysis, and generate insights. It provides a framework for creating agents that can work with various data sources and tools, enabling developers to build intelligent applications that leverage AI capabilities.

## User Guide

- [Datasources Overview](https://docs.datu.fi/latest/user-guide/datasources/datasources/index.md)
- [Postgres](https://docs.datu.fi/latest/user-guide/datasources/postgres/index.md)
- [Sqlserver](https://docs.datu.fi/latest/user-guide/datasources/sqlserver/index.md)
- [Container service](https://docs.datu.fi/latest/user-guide/deploy/deploy_as_container_service/index.md)
